Text: Can i use this .nrg-file(This is a NERO-file, i suppose) on Mac?
wow, big file for 28 songs? What's Up

It's simply the full content of the original record. 100%. No compression or quality loss. And it can be mentioned that here's no need to burn it over to a physical record. Just upload it (the nrg file that is) on to DAEMON Tools or similar software, and play it by the use of Media Player or what ever you want.
